verses.verse: And when <S%H5315>any<s%> will <S%H7126>offer<s%> a meat <S%H7133>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> shall be of fine <S%H5560>flour;<s%> and he shall <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on it, and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> <S%H5921>thereon:<s%>

And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> it to <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> the <S%H3548>priests:<s%> and he shall <S%H7061>take<s%> out of <S%H8033>there<s%> his <S%H4393>handful<s%> <S%H7062><s%> of the <S%H5560>flour<s%> thereof, and of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> thereof, with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> thereof; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> the <S%H234>memorial<s%> of it on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> to be an offering made by fire, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

And the <S%H3498>remnant<s%> of the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall be <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons':<s%> it is a thing <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> of the offerings of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> made by fire.

And <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H7126>bring<s%> an <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H644>baked<s%> in the <S%H8574>oven,<s%> it shall be <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> or <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafers<s%> <S%H4886>anointed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> your <S%H7133>oblation<s%> be a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> baked in a <S%H4227>pan,<s%> it shall be of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened,<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>
You shall <S%H6626>part<s%> it in <S%H6595>pieces,<s%> and <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H5921>thereon:<s%> it is a meat <S%H4503>offering.<s%>
And <S%H518>if<s%> your <S%H7133>oblation<s%> be a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> baked in the frying <S%H4802>pan,<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>made<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

And you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> that is <S%H6213>made<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> things to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and when it is <S%H7126>presented<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> he shall <S%H5066>bring<s%> it to the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7311>take<s%> from the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> a <S%H234>memorial<s%> thereof, and shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> it is an offering made by fire, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And that which is <S%H3498>left<s%> of the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall be <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons':<s%> it is a thing <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> of the offerings of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> made by fire.

<S%H3808>No<s%> meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> shall be <S%H6213>made<s%> with <S%H2557>leaven:<s%> for you shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7603>leaven,<s%> nor <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1706>honey,<s%> in any offering of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> made by fire.

As for the <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of the first <S%H7225>fruits,<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> them to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> but they shall not be <S%H5927>burnt<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell.<s%>

And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of your meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall you <S%H4414>season<s%> with <S%H4417>salt;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you suffer the <S%H4417>salt<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of your <S%H430>God<s%> to be <S%H7673>lacking<s%> from your meat <S%H4503>offering:<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H7133>offerings<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H4417>salt.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H7126>offer<s%> a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> of your first <S%H1061>fruits<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> for the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> of your first <S%H1061>fruits<s%> green <S%H24>ears<s%> of corn <S%H7033>dried<s%> by the <S%H784>fire,<s%> even <S%H1643>corn<s%> <S%H1643>beaten<s%> out of <S%H3759>full<s%> <S%H3759>ears.<s%>
And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on it, and <S%H7760>lay<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> <S%H5921>thereon:<s%> it is a meat <S%H4503>offering.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> the <S%H234>memorial<s%> of it, part of the <S%H1643>beaten<s%> <S%H1643>corn<s%> thereof, and part of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> thereof, with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> thereof: it is an offering made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
